name: GGJ 2017: Volley Roger
description:
Global Game Jam 2017 entry.  Original submission text below:

Physics based splash-em-up. Up to eight players can set sail by using half of a controller each. Use the stick to steer, and hold the bumper to aim your shots! Hit players in to naval mines or strike them with cannonballs to put them at the bottom of the ocean.

Made by John Guerra, Dillon DeSimone, Tom Farro, and Kelly Zhang.
